room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: The experience was great. We will gladly recommend it to others. The adventure we were apart of was well thought out.

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: We took our family â€” a group of seven cousins, siblings and two parents and chose the Gold Rush room. We had a blast and it was the quickest hour spent. It was magic watching the kids work to get us out with 26 seconds to spare

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: This was for a team building exercise. It was so much fun! We had a great team! Everyone worked so well together and we were the first group to ESCAPE! I had so much fun I would recommend not only for team building but family and friends!

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: I played the Goldrush room with my two boys (age 10 and 7), and we all loved it. We needed extra clues since it was just the three of us, but the workers were super friendly. There was a lot of variety in the types of puzzles/clues.

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Jacksonville in Jacksonville
review: I've been to a few other escape rooms but this was the absolute best!! I was able to bring 4 other friends so we had 5 people in the room. I think this was a good number for this room.Room: Gold Rush Level: 7/103 free clues, all additional cost you 3 minutes The standard price is $33/person and after understanding how this game works I think it's worth it! It'sVery immersive experience, without being scary. Lots of puzzles and a great introduction to the rules. Justin explained everything clearly and was really nice to our crew.We made it out with 15 minutes to spare!
